com.box.boxjavalibv2

Class BoxRESTClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.box.restclientv2.BoxBasicRestClient
      • com.box.boxjavalibv2.BoxRESTClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBoxRESTClient
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MockRestClient

    public class BoxRESTClient
extends BoxBasicRestClient
    API v2 client. By default, DefaultHttpClient is used as underlying http client. This takes visitors for requests and handles OAuth failures.
